title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 24 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 24 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: The earth is the LORD's, and the fulness thereof; the world, and they that dwell therein.
lineList.cn: 地和其中所充满的，世界和住在其间的，都属耶和华。

lineList.en: For he hath founded it upon the seas, and established it upon the floods.
lineList.cn: 他把地建立在海上，安定在大水之上。

lineList.en: Who shall ascend into the hill of the LORD? or who shall stand in his holy place?
lineList.cn: 谁能登耶和华的山。谁能站在他的圣所。

lineList.en: He that hath clean hands, and a pure heart; who hath not lifted up his soul unto vanity, nor sworn deceitfully.
lineList.cn: 就是手洁心清，不向虚妄，起誓不怀诡诈的人。

lineList.en: He shall receive the blessing from the LORD, and righteousness from the God of his salvation.
lineList.cn: 他必蒙耶和华赐福，又蒙救他的神使他成义。

lineList.en: This is the generation of them that seek him, that seek thy face, O Jacob. Selah.
lineList.cn: 这是寻求耶和华的族类，是寻求你面的雅各（细拉）。

lineList.en: Lift up your heads, O ye gates; and be ye lift up, ye everlasting doors; and the King of glory shall come in.
lineList.cn: 众城门哪，你们要抬起头来。永久的门户，你们要被举起。那荣耀的王将要进来。

lineList.en: Who is this King of glory? The LORD strong and mighty, the LORD mighty in battle.
lineList.cn: 荣耀的王是谁呢。就是有力有能的耶和华，在战场上有能的耶和华。

lineList.en: Lift up your heads, O ye gates; even lift them up, ye everlasting doors; and the King of glory shall come in.
lineList.cn: 众城门哪，你们要抬起头来。永久的门户，你们要把头抬起。那荣耀的王将要进来。

lineList.en: Who is this King of glory? The LORD of hosts, he is the King of glory. Selah.
lineList.cn: 荣耀的王是谁呢。万军之耶和华，他是荣耀的王。（细拉）
